question: This state tops in the Gross Enrolment Ratio as per the report of AISHE 2016-17.
explanation: Union Minister of Human Resource Development, Prakash Javadekar released All India Survey on Higher Education (AISHE) report 2016-2017.Among all states, Tamil Nadu topped in terms of Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER) in higher education. Tamil Nadu recorded 46.9% GER. Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER) has increased from 24.5% in 2015-16 to 25.2 in 2016-17. GER is a ratio of enrolment in higher education to population in the eligible age group (18-23) years. Gender Parity Index (GPI) too has improved from 0.86 to 0.94 for the corresponding period.
